messages.subject: Understanding unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: **I hope this helps and as far as unschooling, I am not sure if this qualifies-I know too little about the topic.** **Unschooling can be a many different
messages.messageBody:
**I hope this helps and as far as unschooling, I am not sure if this
qualifies-I know too little about the topic.**

**Unschooling can be a many different things to many different people....that
is the beauty of thinking with your own mind. **

Both these statements were made by the same poster within 12 hours of each
other. I don't think that's enough time to really truly deeply understand the
concept so as to be undertaking to correct people who've been unschooling for
years and spending much time talking and thinking and writing about the ideas
and concepts for many of those years.

Deborah in IL
